review.title: “Maybe biased...”
review.pros: Pros – You have regular work hours, so u get proper time 2 study...or mayb attend classes. The partners let u in late from classes, or leave a little bit early, maybe.
review.cons: Cons – They expect you to extend articles to cover up for any extra leave you've taken. So absolutely no question of dummy articles.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep revising the pay scale at regular intervals to compensate according to experience as prescribed by CA guidelines.
